abstract: The newest Apple set-top boxes come with storage space for the programs you download, but you can delete those added apps if space gets tight.
snippet: The newest Apple set-top boxes come with storage space for the programs you download, but you can delete those added apps if space gets tight.
lead_paragraph: Q. I have one of the new 32-gigabyte Apple TV models and enjoy many of the new apps and games for it. How can I tell how much storage space I have used so far?

headline.main: Clearing Space on the Apple TV
headline.print_headline: Checking Space on an Apple TV
